title: Chapter 1842 - Determining Life And Death
body:
Chapter 1842 - Determining Life And Death

Luo Tiandu’s every move had become the center of attention.

But Xi Ning’s brow furrowed imperceptibly. She said icily, “Didn’t we agree to meet in the Elephant Province? Why have you come looking for me here instead?”

Luo Tiandu chuckled. “If I hadn’t come, how could I have found out that even the likes of Qing Xiao and Jin Zhuliu dared treat you with such disrespect?”

He then swept his gaze across Qing Xiao and his companions, his eyes shining with coldness. The three divine children were instantly solemn.

All of them knew how terrifying an existence Luo Tiandu was. He wasn’t just an unparalleled figure among Great Profound Stage cultivators. His background was incomparably startling too!

Fan Zhui stood to the sidelines in silence, but inwardly, he was unprecedentedly nervous. He couldn’t help but sweat on Su Yi’s behalf.

Luo Tiandu was domineering, tyrannical, and iron-blooded by nature. Furthermore, before setting off for the Immortal Realm, he proclaimed his intentions of destroying the Heretic Reincarnator!

Meanwhile, next to Su Yi…

Xi Ning’s voice was full of blatant distaste. “I told you, there’s no need for you to...
